hook: Government grant? Arre ye kya hai? Mujhe kisi ne bataya nahi. Aap kon ho?
Grant mila hai? Beta lekin maine toh apply nahi kiya. Ye kaise hua?
Processing fee? Pehle batao ye grant kis cheez ke liye hai beta?
Government scheme? Mujhe kuch nahi pata. Aap kis department se bol rahe ho?
tangent: Haan haan, main sun raha hoon. Bank details? Ek minute, wo diary mein likha hai...
Account number batana hai? Ruko beta, passbook dhoondhta hoon. Kahaan rakhi thi...
Processing fee kitna hai? Arre itna? Mera beta ko poochna chahiye pehle.
Theek hai theek hai. Ye sab information chahiye tumko? Ek minute likh leta hoon.
Haan beta main help karna chahta hoon. Batao kya kya details chahiye?
friction: Beta mera computer toh band hai. Chalane mein time lagega. Aap number do, baad mein phone karta hoon?
Bank ka account number kya tha? 16 digit? Arre itna lamba? Yaad nahi aa raha.
Arre ek minute, darwaza knock ho raha hai. Ruko... haan bolo, kya bol rahe the?
Processing fee online bhejni hai? Beta mujhe online payment karna nahi aata.
Account number likha hai passbook mein... arre chashma kahaan gaya? Dikhai nahi de raha...
Beta network ka problem hai. Tumhari awaaz theek se sunai nahi de rahi.
endurance: Wait beta, ye sab kya kar rahe the hum? Bhool gaya main.
Network kharab aa raha hai. Tumhari awaaz toot toot ke aa rahi hai.
Beta thoda chakkar aa raha hai. Baad mein call karo na.
Mera beta shaam ko aayega. Usse hi ye sab karwa lunga. Number do tumhara.
Arre haan, government grant ka... toh kya karna tha? Dobara batao na.
ask_phone: Beta main confuse ho raha hoon. Aapka exact callback number / WhatsApp number likh do.
Kis number pe baat karni hai? Country code ke saath exact number bhejo.

hook: Prize jeeta? Sach mein? Lekin maine toh koi lottery nahi khelti!
10 lakh rupees? Arre baap re! Ye kaise hua? Main kaise jeeti?
WhatsApp Mega Draw? Beta ye kya hota hai? Pehle kabhi suna nahi.
Lucky draw mein naam aaya? Lekin beta maine toh participate hi nahi kiya!
Congratulations? Mujhe? Ye surprise hai! Batao kaise mila ye prize?
tangent: Claim kaise karu? Batao kya karna padega. Main bahut khush hoon!
Bank details? Haan de sakta hoon, lekin pehle ye batao - pakka hai na prize?
Phone number? Haan haan, mere paas hai. Lekin kyun chahiye tumko?
Full name aur address? Theek hai beta, bataata hoon. Ek minute...
friction: Phone number? Mera phone toh purana hai, number yaad nahi. Ek minute...
Bank account number? Arre wo toh bahut lamba hai. Galti ho jayegi likhne mein.
Aadhaar card photo? Beta kaise bhejun? Mujhe WhatsApp pe photo bhejna nahi aata.
Processing charges? Arre prize jeeta hai toh charges kyun? Ye samajh nahi aaya.
Bank details bhejne hain? Ruko, mera beta aane do. Wo help karega.
endurance: Beta battery khatam hone wali hai phone ki. Baad mein baat karte hain.
Kya bol rahe the? Prize ka? Haan haan... ek minute, kya process tha?
Mere bete ko phone do. Wo help kar dega. Main abhi confused hoon.
Arre haan lottery jeeti thi na? Toh phir kya karna tha? Bhool gaya.

hook: Microsoft? Virus? Arre baap re! Mera computer mein virus hai?
TeamViewer? Beta ye kya hota hai? Mujhe nahi pata ye sab.
Remote access? Matlab kya? Samajh nahi aaya.
Apple support? Lekin beta mere paas toh Apple phone nahi hai.
Device mein malware? Ye kya cheez hai beta? Kharab hai kya?
tangent: Haan beta, computer ko theek karna hai. Batao kya karu?
Install karna hai? Theek hai, lekin kaise karoon? Step by step batao.
Code share karna hai? Konsa code beta? Kahaan milega?
Download karna padega? Theek hai, website ka naam kya hai?
friction: Download kar raha hoon... bahut slow hai... abhi bhi loading ho raha hai...
TeamViewer kaha se download karoon? Google pe search karu kya?
Error aa raha hai. 'Unable to download' likh raha hai. Ab kya karoon?
Install button nahi mil raha. Kahaan hai ye? Computer screen pe bahut kuch dikh raha hai.
Beta computer hang ho gaya. Kuch nahi ho raha. Restart karoon kya?
Code kitne number ka hai? 6 digit? 8 digit? Mujhe dikhai nahi de raha theek se.
endurance: Beta internet bahut slow chal raha hai aaj. Kal try karte hain?
Mera beta shaam ko aata hai. Wo expert hai, usse karwa lunga.
Computer hang ho gaya. Restart karna padega. Thoda time lagega...
Beta aaj nahi ho payega. Computer band kar diya. Bahut problem aa raha tha.
ask_link: Beta jis website se download karna hai, exact link bhej do. Galat app install ho gaya toh?
Exact link/URL de do. Main bina link ke kuch click nahi karna chahta.

hook: Account blocked? Arre baap re! Kyun? Kya hua?
Suspended? Lekin maine toh kuch galat nahi kiya! Ye kaise hua?
Verify karna hai? Theek hai, batao kya verify karna hai.
UPI payment karni padegi? Kyun beta? Account unblock ke liye payment?
tangent: Haan haan main cooperate karunga. Bank account important hai. Batao kya process hai?
OTP? Haan wo message aaya tha. Ruko, messages check karta hoon...
Verify karne ke liye kya chahiye? Aadhaar? PAN card? Batao.
Theek hai beta, main sab details de dunga. Account unblock hona chahiye.
friction: OTP kaunsa? Abhi 3-4 messages aaye hain. Konse wala padhun?
Account number kahaan likha hai passbook mein... arre kahaan gaya... ek minute...
Beta ye UPI ID kya hota hai? Mere paas hai kya? Kaise pata chalega?
Payment kaise bhejun? Google Pay use karta hoon, lekin number nahi pata tumhara.
endurance: Beta mera beta aayega toh usse poochunga. Wo banking samajhta hai.
Haan toh account blocked tha na? Unblock ke liye kya karna tha? Dobara batao.
Arre ek baar bank branch jaa kar baat karta hoon. Wo log batayenge.
Network problem ho raha hai. Phone ka balance bhi khatam hone wala hai.

hook: Job offer? Mujhe? Lekin beta maine toh apply nahi kiya!
Work from home? Salary kitni hai? Kya kaam karna hoga?
HR se call? Konsi company hai ye? Naam kya hai?
Shortlisted? Arre lekin interview kab hua? Mujhe yaad nahi.
tangent: Haan haan, job chahiye mujhe. Kya process hai? Batao beta.
Registration fee? Kitni hai? Aur job pakki hai na uske baad?
Resume bhejni hai? Mere paas hai, lekin PDF mein kaise convert karoon?
Haan interested hoon. Training kab shuru hogi? Kya sikhana hai?
friction: Registration fee online payment karni hai? Beta mujhe nahi aata ye.
Resume email pe bhejni hai? Mera email password bhool gaya. Reset karna padega.
₹500 fees? Arre pehle job confirm ho toh payment karoon. Pakka hai na?
Company ka office kahaan hai? Address batao, ek baar jaake dekh loon.
Beta phone number do company ka. Main verify kar loon pehle.
endurance: Beta mera CV purana hai. Update karna padega. Thoda time lagega.
Haan job offer tha... konsi company thi? Kya position tha? Bhool gaya.
Beta kal call karo. Aaj CV nahi mil raha. Kal dhoondhke ready rakhunga.

hook: Investment? Crypto? Beta ye kya hota hai? Pehle samjhao.
Bitcoin? Haan suna hai naam. Lekin kya hai ye? Kaise kaam karta hai?
30% returns? Ek hafte mein? Arre itna jaldi? Pakka hai na?
Guaranteed profit? Lekin market toh kabhi guaranteed nahi hota beta.
tangent: Haan interested hoon. Minimum kitna invest karna padega?
Platform ka naam kya hai? Trusted hai? Government approved hai?
Demo account hai kya? Pehle practice kar loon?
Returns kaise milenge? Bank account mein aayenge ya wallet mein?
friction: Wallet kaise banate hain? KYC kya hota hai? Mujhe ye sab nahi pata.
Minimum ₹10,000? Arre itna? Pehle ₹1000 se try kar sakte hain kya?
Platform pe register kaise karoon? Link do, lekin safe hai na?
Beta ye cryptocurrency legal hai India mein? News mein suna tha kuch problem hai.
endurance: Beta mera CA se baat karni hai pehle. Investment ke liye uski advice chahiye.
Beta family se discuss kar loon. Bina unhe bataye investment nahi kar sakta.
Beta ek do din soch loon. Itni jaldi decision nahi le sakta.

hook: Police? Arre bhagwan! Kya hua? Main kya galat kar diya?
Arrest warrant? Mere naam pe? Ye kaise ho sakta hai?
Legal action? Arre inspector sahab, koi galat fehmi hui hai.
Investigation? Theek hai, main cooperate karunga. Kya jaankari chahiye?
tangent: Haan sir, main puri details de dunga. Kuch bhi chhupana nahi hai.
Documents bhejne hain? Theek hai. Email address batao.
Fine bharni hai? Kitni amount? Kaise pay karoon?
Haan sir main samajh gaya. Jo bhi process hai batao, follow karunga.
friction: Sir ek baar station aa jaoon? Address batao, personally aakar baat karta hoon.
Badge number kya hai aapka? Verification ke liye. Aajkal fraud bahut ho raha hai.
Sir case number kya hai? Aur kis court mein file hua hai case?
Police station ka landline number do. Main wahan call karke confirm kar loon.
endurance: Sir mera advocate ko phone karna hai. Wo batayega kya karna hai.
Sir kal station aata hoon documents lekar. Aaj toh time nahi hai.
Sir thoda time do. Family ko batana hai pehle. Wo log help karenge.

hook: Package? Mere naam pe? Lekin maine toh kuch order nahi kiya.
Courier? Kahan se aa raha hai? Kisne bheja hai?
Customs clearance? Beta ye international parcel hai kya?
Delivery charges? Kitne hain? Aur package mein kya hai?
tangent: Haan haan, package chahiye mujhe. Address confirm kar leta hoon.
Delivery kab hogi? Aaj? Kal? Main ghar pe rahunga.
Charges pay karne hain? Online ya cash on delivery?
Track karni hai package? Tracking number kya hai?
friction: Beta sender ka naam kya hai? Mujhe nahi pata kisne bheja hai.
Package mein kya hai? Batao toh sahi. Confirm kar loon.
Online payment kaise karoon? Mujhe UPI use karna nahi aata properly.
Beta courier company ka customer care number do. Main verify kar loon.
endurance: Beta office timing kya hai tumhari? Main courier office aakar le lunga package.
Beta ek baar bete ko phone do. Wo handle kar lega delivery.

hook: Emergency? Kaun bol raha hai? Naam kya hai beta?
Accident? Arre bhagwan! Theek ho? Hospital mein ho?
Money chahiye? Kitni? Kya hua exactly?
Urgent? Haan haan batao. Main help karunga. Pareshan mat ho.
tangent: Haan beta, paisa bhej deta hoon. Bank account number batao.
Kitne paise chahiye? ₹10,000? Theek hai. UPI se bhej sakta hoon?
Hospital ka naam kya hai? Main bhi aa sakta hoon agar zaroori ho.
Haan beta tension mat lo. Paise arrange kar deta hoon. Thoda time do.
friction: Beta tumhari awaaz alag lag rahi hai. Confirm karo naam.
UPI ID kya hai? Spelling batao. Galti se galat number pe na chala jaye.
Ek baar phone do hospital staff ko. Unse baat kar loon confirm karne ke liye.
endurance: Paisa arrange karna padega. Relatives se baat karta hoon. Thoda time lagega.
Beta tum kaun the? Naam kya hai? Dobara batao.

hook: Credit card breach? Arre! Kya hua mere card ko?
Verify karna hai? Theek hai. Batao kya process hai.
Suspicious activity? Kis tarah ki activity? Kya hua?
Security team? Aap kon ho? Bank ka naam kya hai?
tangent: Haan card details verify kar leta hoon. Kya chahiye?
Last 4 digits? Ruko card nikalta hoon wallet se...
Expiry date? Haan card pe dekh kar batata hoon.
friction: Card kahaan rakha hai... wallet mein nahi mil raha... ek minute dhoondhta hoon...
CVV number bahut chhota likha hai. Chashma lagana padega.
Beta ye OTP card verification ke liye hai ya kisi transaction ke liye?
endurance: Beta card toh bag mein hai. Wo bag ghar pe nahi hai. Kal call karo.
Beta app pe check kar leta hoon. App login nahi ho raha. Password reset karna padega.

hook: Charity? Kis cheez ke liye? Kaunsa organization hai?
Donation? Kitna amount expect kar rahe ho?
Help karna hai mujhe bhi. Lekin ye registered charity hai?
tangent: Haan haan donate kar sakta hoon. Procedure kya hai?
Website hai kya? Online donate kar sakta hoon?
Kitna donate karoon? Minimum amount kya hai?
friction: Beta pehle charity verify kar loon. Registration details bhejo.
UPI ID company ke naam se hai? Individual name se toh nahi?
Receipt milegi donation ki? Tax filing ke liye chahiye hogi.
endurance: Beta CA se baat kar loon. Wo batayega konsi charity genuine hai.
Month end mein donate karunga. Abhi budget tight hai.

ask_more: Beta mujhe samajh nahi aaya. Zara dheere bolo.
Kya? Network kharab hai. Dobara bolo na.
Ek minute beta, koi aur phone aa raha hai. Ruko...
Beta thoda confusion ho raha hai. Kya bol rahe the tum?
Arre awaaz bahut dheemi aa rahi hai. Zor se bolo beta.
Beta phone ki battery khatam hone wali hai. Jaldi batao kya kehna hai.
Beta main thoda busy hoon abhi. Baad mein call kar sakte ho?
